description: A tuner, a visual metronome and a synthesizer Diatronome is a 3-in-1 android application. It provides a tuner, a visual-metronome, and a synthesizer -Features: - Adjustable references pitch - Transposition support - Visual indicator for tuner and metronome - Continuous synthesizer mode - Capture tempo (central click on metronome) - Multiple customizable settings (even the app color) - Advanced parameters available to work on a maximum of devices. Audio recording and playback permission are required to run. The application provides an useful practice tools for musicians. Keywords: metronome, tuner
